lines.text: No matter what happens after it - jumped over for promotions, wife runs off with some biochemist, who knows what... But we would always have this thing to fall back on. We could always say, "Yeah, fine, but they never got me like we got her."
Never trust anything that can bleed for a week and not die.
Life is for the taking, is it not?
Never lose control, that's the key.
I get so used to saying what people want to hear I forget sometimes they might just want the truth.
Let me give you a professional tip. The word is ASK.
Fuck her! Let's get a sandwich!
Look at you! You are fucking handicapped! You think you can choose? Men falling at your feet?
What's the difference between a golf ball and a G-spot? I'll spend twenty minutes looking for a golf ball!
Just remember, I can't hear you when you're lying.
Women. Nice ones, the most frigid of the race, it doesn't matter in the end. Inside they're all the same meat and gristle and hatred just simmering.
